title: one bedroom in great inman sq apartment
posting_body: Looking for one roommate to fill a 3 room apartment in somerville.
Dishwasher, free in unit laundry, porch, lots of storage and great sunlight.
We are two women who are young professionals in our 20s who are looking for someone who can be respectful in common spaces, clean and hopefully a person we can get to know a bit and be friendly with!
Please reply and I would be happy to send photos and answer any other questions.
